items.content_html:
THIS DOMAIN NAME IS FOR SALE
CLICK HERE TO ENQUIRE VIA EMAIL

This website is dedicated to XCH 555 a Ferrari 250 GTE/TRC. - Stuart Anderson.

Many of you now know I'm no longer the owner of this fabulous machine.

I can not begin to tell you how much pleasure it gave me in my 17 years of ownership, but once I decided not to race the car any more I thought it was time for a new custodian, that lucky person is
Darren Hills.

I hope we see Darren and the TR out and about enjoying it as it should be.

Click the photograph to see the car with racing decals.
